snippet: The day before the much-anticipated men’s halfpipe competition, there were broad concerns ranging from the shape of the pipe to the snow condition.
abstract: Conditions of snowboarding's Olympic halfpipe in Sochi are widely criticized by athletes on the last day of training before the high-profile competitions, with some even suggesting that contests be postponed until course conditions improve.

byline.original: By BEDEL SAGET and JOHN BRANCH

lead_paragraph: The day before the much-anticipated men’s halfpipe competition, there were broad concerns ranging from the shape of the pipe to the snow condition.

headline.main: Plenty of Spills and Fewer Thrills on Bumpy Ride
headline.print_headline: Plenty of Spills and Less Thrills on Bumpy Ride
